text: » The event loop is a fundamental part of Node.js and is the secret to its efficiency. » However, Node.js is still limited by the amount of processing power it can harness. « Complex programs that require a lot of processing significantly can slow things down. « While Node.js can handle asynchronous I/O functions with ease, it is not suitable for compute-intensive applications like machine learning. » Hence, it is essential to weigh the pros and cons before choosing a framework or a runtime environment.
